rows.text_1_facilitator: @data.characters.f1_father.name wants his young children to learn about respect for their elders. His parents taught him to respect his elders and he wants his children to do the same. Letâ€™s see how @data.characters.f1_father.name and his wife, @data.characters.f1_mother.name discuss their parenting values.

character_1_text.eng: When I was playing with our kids earlier, they raised their voices at me and I was shocked.

character_2_text.eng: Hmm, maybe they were trying to tell you something with excitement.

rows.character_1_text: When I was playing with our kids earlier, they raised their voices at me and I was shocked.
rows.character_2_text: Hmm, maybe they were trying to tell you something with excitement.

rows.character_1_text: Hmm, maybe. When I was young, my parents never allowed me to speak loudly to them. It is a sign of respect for elders.

character_1_text.eng: Hmm, maybe. When I was young, my parents never allowed me to speak loudly to them. It is a sign of respect for elders.

character_2_text.eng: I think that respect for elders is very important and a good tradition to pass down to our kids. We also want our kids to be open with their feelings.

rows.character_2_text: I think that respect for elders is very important and a good tradition to pass down to our kids. We also want our kids to be open with their feelings.

rows.character_1_text: Thatâ€™s true. We can help our kids to express themselves while still being respectful.

character_1_text.eng: Thatâ€™s true. We can help our kids to express themselves while still being respectful.
